data.what_is: Nielsen provides analytics, planning, and insights into your marketing data as well as access to Nielsen's data.
data.product_description: Nielsen provides analytics, planning, and insights into your marketing data as well as access to Nielsen's data.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database. 10 reviewers of Nielsen Marketing Cloud have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: As reported in 10 Nielsen Marketing Cloud reviews. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: ROI Tracking
features.content: Helps marketers measure return on investment (ROI) by analyzing campaign effectiveness against costs

features.name: Data Collection
features.content: Gathers data about the effectiveness, impact, and reach of marketing campaigns

features.name: Customer Insights
features.content: Collects and reports on data relating to customer journeys, preferences, and history

features.name: Multi-User Access
features.content: Allows multiple users access to a unified, transparent overview of analytics, dashboards, and campaign results

features.name: Spend Management
features.content: Includes features for budgeting, forecasting, and managing marketing investments

features.name: White Label
features.content: Offers a white labeling service for agencies or resellers to customize platform branding

features.name: Campaign Insights
features.content: Analyzes historical and current marketing campaigns to inform future strategy

features.name: Reports and Dashboards
features.content: Creates reports and dashboards to analyze results of campaigns

features.name: Campaign Stickiness
features.content: Identifies which marketing campaigns resolved in open or closed opportunities

features.name: Multichannel Tracking
features.content: Collects marketing campaign performance data across multiple channels

features.name: Brand Optimization
features.content: Provides opportunities for brands and businesses to fix or modify existing or future campaigns via feedback

features.name: Predictive Analytics
features.content: Uses artificial intelligence (AI) to predict campaign outcomes and suggest actions for optimization

initial_reviews.review_title: Good platform to carry out good marketing automation.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I like that it is a platform that offers advanced segmentation and data analysis tools to help companies better understand their audience and improve their marketing strategies. It helps optimize advertising campaigns by providing detailed information on consumer behavior.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I don't like the complexity of its interface and the associated cost. The learning curve is steep, and the prices can be prohibitive for small businesses.

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
This program has helped me solve problems related to accurate audience segmentation, providing detailed data to understand consumer behavior. This facilitates the customization of advertising strategies, improving the effectiveness of campaigns. In addition, it offers in-depth analyzes that allow you to make informed decisions about advertising investment. Benefits include a better understanding of the market, greater efficiency in targeted advertising, and the ability to optimize campaigns for better results.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
review_question_answers.answer: I like that it is a platform that offers advanced segmentation and data analysis tools to help companies better understand their audience and improve their marketing strategies. It helps optimize advertising campaigns by providing detailed information on consumer behavior.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
review_question_answers.answer: I don't like the complexity of its interface and the associated cost. The learning curve is steep, and the prices can be prohibitive for small businesses.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: This program has helped me solve problems related to accurate audience segmentation, providing detailed data to understand consumer behavior. This facilitates the customization of advertising strategies, improving the effectiveness of campaigns. In addition, it offers in-depth analyzes that allow you to make informed decisions about advertising investment. Benefits include a better understanding of the market, greater efficiency in targeted advertising, and the ability to optimize campaigns for better results.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I like the feature where all information is kept in the cloud.
I like the feature where information and records are downloadable
I like the part where their clouds enhance intuition into the different audience
Customizing your needs and targetting your audience is one of the best features of this cloud system. It gives one the ability to take the right approach and meet the right people with the right products at the right time.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I'm not too fond of the part where they are too selective of who to accommodate in the cloud marketing system.
Small businesses looking to grow don't stand a chance here. The cloud system literally looks at businesses that has potential and can be of benefit to them.

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
Nielsen Marketing Cloud has dramatically benefited me because I have used their services to increase my customer list and make healthy decisions in moving my business forward.
This software has given me an edge in gaining insights into customer behavior and design to make informed decisions on handling business strategy.
The cloud has been of great storage to me, and I have used it to download and get excellent reports on all marketing strategies.

initial_reviews.review_title: Single pane of glass for all the marketers out there!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
1. Audience Planner - is one of the greatest feature in this toolset. It makes it different from other tools available in the industry. Duplication can easily be identified. Also, Audience Planning can no more become easier than what you will get with this tool, out of the box.
2. Data as a service (DaaS) - is also one of the graeat feature which removes the manual overhead from the client.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
1. Platform's performance is not up to the mark. This can be improved with servious refactoring of the entire tool.
2. Simple activities like downloading content like reports becomes super slow at time, which circles back to the limitations of the tool.

Recommendations to others considering Nielsen Marketing Cloud:
If you are looking for a single tool for the needs of your marketing team, this stands in the queue and possibly in the top three positions.

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using it for analytics, data management and for a single pane of glass and reports for our senior leadership. We fetch meaningful insights from this tool which are then presented to our stakeholders to better undertand the achievements and loopholes.

2. Data as a service (DaaS) - is also one of the graeat feature which removes the manual overhead from the client.

1. Platform's performance is not up to the mark. This can be improved with servious refactoring of the entire tool.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Nielsen Marketing Cloud:
review_question_answers.answer: If you are looking for a single tool for the needs of your marketing team, this stands in the queue and possibly in the top three positions.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We are using it for analytics, data management and for a single pane of glass and reports for our senior leadership. We fetch meaningful insights from this tool which are then presented to our stakeholders to better undertand the achievements and loopholes.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
Downloading reports becomes difficult especially for those at home or working at home. Intergration developments are time consuming.

Recommendations to others considering Nielsen Marketing Cloud:
I would make sure to really read into Neison Marketing for usage and to fit your needs. Also, compare it to other Marketing Cloud programs.

It allows me to build and duplicate audiences with the platform for surveys.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I like that you can see channels' current and historical performance. They continuously make updates to the platform to ensure you have a great user experience.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
The depth is excellent; however they could simplify the UI a bit; it can be a big learning curve to get used to where everything is, which I find as a disadvantage. However, after some time, like most things, you get used to it. Aside from the navigation aspect, everything works quite well.

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving our marketing effectiveness and can track if we are reaching our goals and targeted demographics. That is every marketer's end goal, so it is a handy tool.

initial_reviews.review_title: Nielsen Marketing Cloud is easy to use.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
When I plan what customers will buy, I make sure my data is analyzed in real time - a principle that informs LM purchases in our newsletter.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I dislike pricing models and contracts that are necessary for consumers.  I will prefer the option of another agreement from one month which does not close us.

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to quickly reach the market with media planning and evaluation without using 4   and 5 different tools to understand our target audience.  We realize that we were able to create savings by purchasing our media, uniting our customers' insights and eliminating its predecessors.

all_reviews.review_title: Good platform to carry out good marketing automation.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I like that it is a platform that offers advanced segmentation and data analysis tools to help companies better understand their audience and improve their marketing strategies. It helps optimize advertising campaigns by providing detailed information on consumer behavior.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I don't like the complexity of its interface and the associated cost. The learning curve is steep, and the prices can be prohibitive for small businesses.

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
This program has helped me solve problems related to accurate audience segmentation, providing detailed data to understand consumer behavior. This facilitates the customization of advertising strategies, improving the effectiveness of campaigns. In addition, it offers in-depth analyzes that allow you to make informed decisions about advertising investment. Benefits include a better understanding of the market, greater efficiency in targeted advertising, and the ability to optimize campaigns for better results.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
review_question_answers.answer: I like that it is a platform that offers advanced segmentation and data analysis tools to help companies better understand their audience and improve their marketing strategies. It helps optimize advertising campaigns by providing detailed information on consumer behavior.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
review_question_answers.answer: I don't like the complexity of its interface and the associated cost. The learning curve is steep, and the prices can be prohibitive for small businesses.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: This program has helped me solve problems related to accurate audience segmentation, providing detailed data to understand consumer behavior. This facilitates the customization of advertising strategies, improving the effectiveness of campaigns. In addition, it offers in-depth analyzes that allow you to make informed decisions about advertising investment. Benefits include a better understanding of the market, greater efficiency in targeted advertising, and the ability to optimize campaigns for better results.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I like the feature where all information is kept in the cloud.
I like the feature where information and records are downloadable
I like the part where their clouds enhance intuition into the different audience
Customizing your needs and targetting your audience is one of the best features of this cloud system. It gives one the ability to take the right approach and meet the right people with the right products at the right time.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I'm not too fond of the part where they are too selective of who to accommodate in the cloud marketing system.
Small businesses looking to grow don't stand a chance here. The cloud system literally looks at businesses that has potential and can be of benefit to them.

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
Nielsen Marketing Cloud has dramatically benefited me because I have used their services to increase my customer list and make healthy decisions in moving my business forward.
This software has given me an edge in gaining insights into customer behavior and design to make informed decisions on handling business strategy.
The cloud has been of great storage to me, and I have used it to download and get excellent reports on all marketing strategies.

all_reviews.review_title: Single pane of glass for all the marketers out there!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
1. Audience Planner - is one of the greatest feature in this toolset. It makes it different from other tools available in the industry. Duplication can easily be identified. Also, Audience Planning can no more become easier than what you will get with this tool, out of the box.
2. Data as a service (DaaS) - is also one of the graeat feature which removes the manual overhead from the client.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
1. Platform's performance is not up to the mark. This can be improved with servious refactoring of the entire tool.
2. Simple activities like downloading content like reports becomes super slow at time, which circles back to the limitations of the tool.

Recommendations to others considering Nielsen Marketing Cloud:
If you are looking for a single tool for the needs of your marketing team, this stands in the queue and possibly in the top three positions.

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using it for analytics, data management and for a single pane of glass and reports for our senior leadership. We fetch meaningful insights from this tool which are then presented to our stakeholders to better undertand the achievements and loopholes.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
Its no more responsive or easy to navigate for the CMS

Like several solutions like this support, it's deficient sometimes, so; I think this is the key to completing the excellence.

Organize all data, make a different dashboard, connect different source of data, in order to analize it.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
The cloud helps enables our advertisers and podcasting partners to run audience-targeted campaigns and  podcasting.Different media mixes work together to achieve specific goals that are central to our clients' businesses

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
nothing about this cloud that I dislike at this time

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
By being able to merge different media outlets together

all_reviews.review_title: Nielsen Marketing Cloud is easy to use.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
When I plan what customers will buy, I make sure my data is analyzed in real time - a principle that informs LM purchases in our newsletter.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I dislike pricing models and contracts that are necessary for consumers.  I will prefer the option of another agreement from one month which does not close us.

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to quickly reach the market with media planning and evaluation without using 4   and 5 different tools to understand our target audience.  We realize that we were able to create savings by purchasing our media, uniting our customers' insights and eliminating its predecessors.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
When I am planning and instinctually know what consumers are going to purchase, I rely on their real-time data to validate my assumptions and inform our media buys.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I dislike the pricing model and the contracts that are required for users. I would prefer a month-to-month contract option that would not lock us in.

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are quickly able to move from media planning and evaluation to go-to-market without using 4 and 5 different tools to understand our target audience. We realize that we were able to unify our media buying, our customer insights and generate savings by eliminating its predecessors.

review_question_answers.answer: We are quickly able to move from media planning and evaluation to go-to-market without using 4 and 5 different tools to understand our target audience. We realize that we were able to unify our media buying, our customer insights and generate savings by eliminating its predecessors.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
Being able to reach many people through one program.

What do you dislike about Nielsen Marketing Cloud?
I have no complaints about the program. It works well.

What problems is Nielsen Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
Limitations of sending info in small quantities.
